title: 如何解读特朗普就中共推动武汉病毒起源阴谋论作出的回应?
contents:
特朗普的回复:
‘No(否认阴谋论会对贸易谈判造成阻碍), we will deal with China. They are going to be buying 250 billion worth of goods and 50 billion from our farmers, and that's a great deal for our country, it's about time somebody did that. And frankly phase two will start negotiating. 
I did read one article(阴谋论相关文章), but I don't think that artical was representative, certainly not of my conversation with Xi. They know where it came from, we all know where it came from.’

完整采访在 https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=q_WM_pMp0Hg 的 1:51:18
